verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w more|strong="H0637"\w* subtle \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*: \w Why|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* paradise?

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Of|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w are|strong="H0802"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* paradise we do \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* paradise, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* \w us|strong="H6435"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w should|strong="H0559"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*; \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w should|strong="H0559"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w*, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w perhaps|strong="H6435"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*: \w No|strong="H3808"\w*, \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* doth \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w what|strong="H2896"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* soever \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thereof, \w your|strong="H3045"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w opened|strong="H6491"\w*: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w Gods|strong="H0430"\w*, \w knowing|strong="H3045"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* fair \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* delightful \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w*: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* thereof, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w did|strong="H0376"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w who|strong="H0376"\w* \w did|strong="H0376"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* \w opened|strong="H6491"\w*: \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w perceived|strong="H3045"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w* \w to|strong="H5869"\w* \w be|strong="H5869"\w* \w naked|strong="H5903"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w sewed|strong="H8609"\w* \w together|strong="H8609"\w* \w fig|strong="H8384"\w* \w leaves|strong="H5929"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w* aprons.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w walking|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* paradise \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* afternoon \w air|strong="H7307"\w*, Adam \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* \w themselves|strong="H2244"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w amidst|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* paradise.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* Adam, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Where|strong="H0335"\w* art thou?

\w And|strong="H6963"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* paradise; \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w was|strong="H6963"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w was|strong="H6963"\w* \w naked|strong="H5903"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* \w myself|strong="H0595"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w*: \w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w told|strong="H5046"\w* thee \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou wast \w naked|strong="H5903"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* whereof \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou shouldst \w not|strong="H1115"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*?

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* Adam \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* thou gavest \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* companion, \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w did|strong="H0834"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* hast thou \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*? \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w she|strong="H4100"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w* deceived \w me|strong="H0398"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w*: \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w thing|strong="H2063"\w*, thou art \w cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H6083"\w*: \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thy breast shalt thou go, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w earth|strong="H6083"\w* shalt thou \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w life|strong="H3117"\w*.

I \w will|strong="H0802"\w* \w put|strong="H7896"\w* enmities \w between|strong="H0996"\w* thee \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H0996"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*: \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* crush thy \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* thou shalt lie \w in|strong="H0802"\w* wait \w for|strong="H0802"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w* \w heel|strong="H6119"\w*.

\w To|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* also \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* thy sorrows, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy conceptions: \w in|strong="H0413"\w* sorrow shalt thou \w bring|strong="H3205"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H0376"\w* under thy \w husbandâ€™s|strong="H0376"\w* power, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w dominion|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H0413"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w Adam|strong="H0121"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast hearkened \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* thy \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* hast \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, whereof \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou shouldst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, \w cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0127"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* thy work; \w with|strong="H3117"\w* labour \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w toil|strong="H6093"\w* shalt thou \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thereof \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* thy \w life|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Thorns|strong="H6975"\w* \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w thistles|strong="H1863"\w* \w shall|strong="H7704"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* bring \w forth|strong="H6779"\w* \w to|strong="H7704"\w* thee; \w and|strong="H0398"\w* thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w herbs|strong="H6212"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* earth.

\w In|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sweat|strong="H2188"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* thy \w face|strong="H0639"\w* shalt thou \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* thou \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*, \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w which|strong="H3899"\w* thou wast \w taken|strong="H3947"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* thou art, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* thou shalt \w return|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0802"\w* Adam \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H0802"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w Eve|strong="H2332"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w of|strong="H0802"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* Adam \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w garments|strong="H3801"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w skins|strong="H5785"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* Adam \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w*, \w knowing|strong="H3045"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w*, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w perhaps|strong="H6435"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w put|strong="H7971"\w* \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* paradise \w of|strong="H0430"\w* pleasure, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w till|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0127"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6086"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* cast \w out|strong="H1644"\w* Adam; \w and|strong="H6086"\w* placed \w before|strong="H6924"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* paradise \w of|strong="H1870"\w* pleasure Cherubims, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w a|strong="H2015"\w* flaming \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w turning|strong="H2015"\w* every \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.
